name: Rabbit Harvest
description:
Rabbit Harvest is a game made for Ludum Dare 52, a game jam where you need to make a game in 72 hours. Here you need to help your old grandmother to take care of her farm chores. Be a good granddaughter!

How to Play: use WASD to move and E to interact with objects/characters.

Credits

Klinsmann Hengles (@KlinsmannHengles) - Game Design and Programmer

See about Art, Sound and Fonts in the credits screen.
